main.name: Hello, I'm Albert!
main.description: Aspiring to work on software engineering projects - with a lot of MATH!
main.bio1: I love programming, I love math, I love physics <3 I just love problem-solving in general, especially if it involves a lot of coding!
main.bio2: Aside from that, I am an extra-outgoing guy who loves conversations and anything-public-speaking.
main.bio3: Also, to keep myself sane (from all the coding), I love to gym and watch anime (Warning: I am a JoJo fan).
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: B. Comp in Computer Science and Mathematics
education.description2: Recipient of NUS Undergraduate Merit Scholarship (ASEAN)
Recipient of Raffles Institution School-Based Full Scholarship (ASEAN)

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: I wrote logic on RAK3172 to integrate ESP32, a Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) module, in C++ for transmission of concrete temperature development data. Then, I developed an android application usin Kotlin to receive concrete temperature data via BLE.

work.title: Teaching Assistant
work.description: I taught CS1010E Introduction to Programming in Python to a class of 20 freshmen. I learned how to explain programming concepts in an easy-to-understand way for those without programming background. This helped me enhance my communication ability to non-IT personnels and deepen my understanding of programming concepts.

skills.name: Framework and Tools
skills.description: ReactJS, Kotlin (Android Studio), ExpressJS, NodeJS, Firebase, MongoDB, Git
